pages.text: 0 OPA! brings a taste of Athens to the heart of Charleston. Platia We use locally sourced produce to serve fresh, traditional Greek cuisine Whether you’re craving our must-try lamb gyro, the local favorite “Hill Billy,” or a vegetarian-friendly option, we’ve got you covered. We’re proud to be named Best Gyro in Charleston 2025.
